value.name: Teachings of Equity
value.desc:
The shore of the Nation of Water is equity.

Equity sets boundaries on rights. Without equity, the rights granted by law will be abused, and become a tool to damage our virtuous customs.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
In the Court of Fontaine, newsies sometimes pick up on what's going on in the wider world from the mouths of adventurers. As the saying goes, "Nothing sells half as well as half the story," To this end, Paban has recently shown a particular interest in news from the wilderness, and has even started using Genius Invokation TCG as a conversation starter to persuade more people to buy his newspapers and exclusive scoops...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: When the battle begins, all characters on both sides gain 1 Energy.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
